alert.note: Alert for Modoc County; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:12PM PST until January 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to three inches. * WHERE...In the Mt. Shasta region of Siskiyou County, including I-5 south of Mt. Shasta City, and a portion of highway 89 between I-5 and McCloud including Snowmans Summit. * WHEN...Through 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult because of slippery roads. The hazardous conditions could impact evening travel. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County; South Central Siskiyou County
